locationSchema.describes: Schema to describe a geographic location

latitude.describes: Latitude of a location in WGS 84 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System) coordinate system

longitude.describes: Longitude of a location in WGS 84 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System) coordinate system

elevation.describes: Elevation of a location in WGS 84 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System) coordinate system

additionalLocationSchema.describes: Other ways of describing a location. For example, geoHash, mapid etc.
